data.title: OLTL's Erin Torpey Quiz
data.meta_description: I have been a fan of One Life to Live for a long time and Erin Torpey is a brillant actress on this show. I hope you enjoy this quiz.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. When was Erin Torpey born?

Answer: February 14, 1981

Erin was a Valentine baby!

2. Erin subletted an apartment from which co-star?

Answer: Robin Strasser (Dorian)

She tripped the alarm off the first day she lived there and the police showed up.

3. In which state did Erin grow up?

Answer: Pennsylvania

Erin grew up in Pennsylvania and moved to New York after she turned 18.

4. On "One Life to Live" her siblings are Joey and Kevin. What is her real life sister's name?

Answer: Shannon

Her sister attends Art School in Manhattan and lives with Erin.

5. Who fathered the baby that Erin's character, Jessica Buchanan, lost after being hit by a car?

Answer: Will Rappaport

Jessica became pregnant after sleeping with her step-brother Will.

6. Which ex-costar did Erin say she had a crush on?

Answer: Nathan Fillion (Ex-Joey)

She said in a "Soap's In Depth" interview that he was hilarious and he gave her massages every day.

7. Who was driving the car that ran Jessica down causing her miscarriage?

Answer: Dorian Lord

Dorian was on her way to apologize to Viki when she accidently ran down Erin's character Jessica.

8. Her real life parents are Sue and Joe Torpey. Who are her parents on the show "One Life To Live"?

Answer: Viki and Clint

During the Niki/Vicki escapade, Niki slept with Mitch Lawrence. Upon returning home to Llanview as Vicki, she slept with Clint. On that night, two of Vicki/Niki's eggs dropped down...one was fertilised by Mitch (Jessica) and the other by Clint (Natalie).

When Vicki went into labor and gave birth...she did not know she had faternal twin daughters, as Mitch Lawrence stole baby Natalie away by mistake.

Thus, while Mitch is Jessica's biological father, Clint is in fact the only male parent she has known...he is the one who helped Vicki raise Jessica.

9. On "One Life to Live" Jessica has three brothers and two sisters. What was the name of her older sister?"

Answer: Megan

She named her baby after her sister Megan.

10. Why is the date 9-9-99 so special to Erin?

Answer: She celebrated 10 years playing Jessica Buchanan

Erin celebrated the mark of a decade on "One Life To Live".

Source: Author evangeline_ethan

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor gtho4 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
